metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23171 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability in all versions of Nim-lang allows unauthenticatedattackers to write files to arbitrary directories via a crafted zip filewith dot-slash characters included in the name of the crafted file.

criterions.comment: nim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
